text.config.repair_gems_config.option.re:
By default, gems don't repair each other.
If enabled, gems can repair each other and themselves (Really OP).

If enabled, repair gems only repair one item before activating cooldown.
Else, it repairs every damaged item in the inventory.
text.config.repair_gems_config.option.un: If disabled, repair gems can be broken.
tooltip.repair_gems.repair_gem.expanded_: Repair items in the holder's inventory every %.2f seconds.
